        The heavly armed destrons hid and waited for shredder and his gang to make an enterance
  Yanshosh@... wrote: 










My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page | Start a new group! 


::Zardus/The Oblitercons::

Hovering in the air, Zardus fires a few more shots at Deemos,
frowning 
when he sees the Predacons running. These Maximals wern't tough at 
all, the Alliance commander thinks, looking down at the Maximals who 
had done this much damage to the Predacon cave, and were now being 
shot at by his troops. Zardus was a bit surprised at how soft the 
Predacons have gotten, letting the Maximals get them like this.

He activates his comm-link. "Predacon commander," he says into it, 
sending the transmission on a Predacon frequency, "This is Zardus. My 
troops are currently taking out the Maximals in your area, do you
need 
further assistance?"

Usually, Zardus would be glad to leave the Predacons to die, but not 
in this case. If the Predacons fell, there would be nothing to stop 
the Maximals from attacking the Alliance. 

Having finished the transmission, Zardus fires a few more shots at 
Deemos.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
With the sound of gunfire, Dark One, in his jet mode, flies into the 
battlefield. He flies by Deemos, sending a volley of laser shots at 
the Maximal.

Behind him, his group runs out of the foilage, opening fire on the 
Maximals. Pyro fires two fireballs at Deemos.

Hiss jumps into the air, transforming into his gun mode and flying at 
Testifier, opening fire.

Breakdown stops a little ways from Blender and Stronghold, 
transforming into an artillery cannon and opening fire on the two 
Maximals, shooting lasers.

Scavanger runs at Testifier, firing his chai
